website_summaries.verdict: The excellent trail performance of the Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid GTX gained commendations from its users. Support, comfort, and waterproofing were packed in a light build. On the other hand, it received negative remarks for its narrow sizing and insufficient cushioning.To sum up, the Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid GTX is a good choice for those who want a light yet supportive gear. However, to get the best out of it, one must not use it frequently on untamed trails; wearing it with an aftermarket insole can also help.
pros: Its virtually no break-in period is adored by some users
A considerable number of wearers love this boot’s lightweight construction
The X Ultra 3 Mid GTX is a comfortable boot, based on a handful of customer and expert reviews
Several outdoor enthusiasts commend its waterproofing as it keeps their feet dry on wet encounters
It is a very supportive boot, as mentioned by a lot of satisfied wearers
According to numerous hikers and a couple of experts, its traction on a variety of surfaces is remarkable
cons: A small group of testers had to give it a low rating in durability
The material used in the upper of the X Ultra 3 Mid GTX is less resistant to abrasion
Its lack of cushioning underfoot has dismayed plenty of owners
A few users state that the X Ultra 3 Mid GTX from Salomon runs narrow

customer_reviews.title: Light boots, summer use
customer_reviews.text: My normal size were slightly too small reordered next size up which are slightly too big, however with thick socks okay. Very easy to put on. Would have preferred more lace hoops to tighten around ankle. Sole excellent. Material good quality. Very light boots which will be great for some light summer walks. I would not expect winter performance from these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These let water in.
customer_reviews.text: First pair developed a leak in right boot. Returned with no problem. Got 2nd pair high also leaked on both boots. Also returned. Will seek alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant boots!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant boots! No breaking in needed and very comfy out of the box. Having owned Salomon boots before, i knew what to expect and these deliver! Even better when bought at the reduced price!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Woodmansey

customer_reviews.title: Top quality boot
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a 10 in all other shoe brands but for salomon I seem to be a 10.5 however great boots light solid and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carl kindleton

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof , good fit
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable walking boot out of the box I've had , No problems so far
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Buy em
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great, really comfy, and waterproof. And price was alot cheaper than the salomon website.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great walking boots !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking boots, so light and comfortable. No need to wear in ! Recommend using Salomon Web site for correct guide for boot sizing
customer_reviews.author: Ms Alison Wootton

customer_reviews.title: These boots are hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfortable. I got a half size bigger than my normal size which is fine. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reg McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable lightweight boot.Not used yet on rogh terrain so can't comment on how robust they are
customer_reviews.author: MR K WOODVINE

customer_reviews.title: Salomon customer service a joke
customer_reviews.text: I’ve updated this review based on my warranty claim for both boots splitting despite minimal wear. I’ve only ever used these for walking the dog, something well within their advertised capabilities. After providing numerous pictures Salomon told me there were no manufacturing defects and the split uppers on both boots were due to wear and tear. They offered me 15% off a replacement pair which I feel is derisory. To sum up, I’m extremely dissatisfied. Salomon have had the chance to remedy this situation but have fobbed me off. My advice is to choose another manufacturer as I will be in the future.......AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but far from waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep them, i really did because they were comfortable (one size up), albeit a little narrow in the foot box (something to bare in mind if you have caveman feet). However, it pains me to say they failed the bucket test, my socks were soaking after a 30 seconds, being careful not to go over the tongue/goretex material. Not the brand they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Ansell

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots but beware of fitting
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for about 1 week now and they seem fine. Just a word of warning re the fitting. They do have quite a narrow fitting. I take a size 11 but Have quite broad feet and previous boots from various suppliers have caused no problem , but I needed to stretch these( stuff with newspaper) for a few days before wearing out on walks. They are now 'broken in' and are fine so not a problem just be aware when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Yosarian

customer_reviews.title: Salomen sizing  - out of step
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 11 For walking boots I go up 1/2 size to allow for thick walking socks so i'm normally size 101/2 These were not size 11 So had to return them . Amazon didn't have the nezt size so ordered elsewhere (a specialist walking gear conpany) and they had a warnig on their site about these Salomen boots sizes being smaller than it should. and recommended going up 1/2 a size Very Poor Show Salomen Cant give zero stars so get one
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are superb walking boots. Salomon produce excellent trainers and boots, very comfortable and remain cool even though they are fully waterproof (Goretex). Certainly not the cheapest but you get what you pay for - quality!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: The Wisdom Of Salomon
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands of walking shoes. These have emerged as the best. My wife and I are keen walkers, and we both agree on this; they fit, they protect the ankles, and they are perfect for hard, semi hard, and soft surfaces. The GoreTex layer keeps the feet dry, and the remarkable fact is the shoes fit perfectly straight out of the box. They are a superb walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kettle

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small
customer_reviews.text: I usually take an 11.5 or 12 depending on the brand. The listing said "True to size. Order normal size." but I went up half a size anyway to a 12.5. They are so painfully tight I will need a 13.5. Except there are none in stock on the whole of Amazon or anywhere else. Will be refunding and finding a different brand. One that uses the same sizing as everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light but bad lacing system so keeps getting loose
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. I felt like I could just start to run even just out of the box. However the lacing system is really poor or actually there is no lacing system which is the biggest problem. There are only two hooks, so the laces keep on getting loose during a long walk
customer_reviews.author: S. T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but small
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the first pair back as far too small, usually wear size 9 reordered size 10 and been using for a few months now. Will buy again though but will probably go up 1/2 size again next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tafflar

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud !
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these mid boots ,easy to get feet in owing to wide gape at tongue, good grip all surfaces . I’ve fitted them with Salomon elastic lacing system (excellent) . But the best bit is their so light as to my existing boots(many) . Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Caulkhead joe

customer_reviews.title: Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid boot
customer_reviews.text: I had great trouble getting the size I required. Normally a size 8 but these Berghaus come up small and narrow. So I found the size 8.5 and these are still too small and narrow. I eventually found and ordered a size 9 these seem to be in short supply everywhere, otherwise a great boot, just go to get the correct size
customer_reviews.author: johny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fit and comfortable, great for Glastonbury and even though I bought them as a replacement for boots that were really uncomfortable, I wore them for the m for the festival and they were fantastic . Loved them and will use these from now on
customer_reviews.author: Andi Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Our 3rd pair of these Salomon Boots, I have used them for Walking, Cycling, Munro Bagging and general use. Light weight, waterproof and extremely comfortable, if these last as the other pairs have I will be well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Lovely boot but sizing way off
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking boot, but way too small - really narrow. My Scarpa's / Brasher / Meindl / Altberg's are all around the ten and a bit, so I go up to an 11 what with thick socks. I couldn't even put my foot in these at size 11. Am guessing I'd need a 12.5 / 13 at a minimum. Shame, as a really lovely looking boot and was pleased with the weight of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Morel

customer_reviews.title: Best walking boots I have purchased... Again
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous pair that finally ended their days, after 6 years of pretty much daily use and weekend abuse. I did not hesitate buying another pair as great value for money, excellent comfort and above all else they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these boots, I’ve found them light and comfortable, great in wet walking conditions as well. The last pair lasted about 2yrs. Only down side are the laces, it’s impossible to tie them so they don’t come done. So I’ve bought lace locks very happy with the results. Only wish Salomon would have supplied better laces in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lister

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He says they are super light and comfortable and so far no blisters which had happened with with some walking boots.
customer_reviews.author: SecretVictoria

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this boot again as I liked it so much. I did have to replace last ones after 2 years wear because of splits where seams meet canvas.
customer_reviews.author: m f arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Salomon run small so maybe order a couple of pairs and send back the worse fitting pair. Great boots, light, comfy, strong, waterproof...
customer_reviews.author: midnightraveller

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boots I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Salomon Ultra 3 Mid GTX boots...They have kept me comfortable and dry all around the world, from The Azores to Teotihuacan and everywhere in between...Durable and ready to tackle anything you throw at them...I have tried many different brands in hiking boots, however Salomon does the trick for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight yet very supportive and incredibly comfortable. Good boot at the moment anyway
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight yet very supportive and incredibly comfortable. Good boot at the moment anyway. How long will they last? We'll see, but no reason to think they won't last. Nice to look at too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my 'go to' boots for location photography, offering comfort and support in equal measure. Simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy Katunayake

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of the same boot and find it hard to change to another. I use them for walking, hiking, working everything. Although the price is expensive the boot is highly durable and will last for long time
customer_reviews.author: edward lynch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent balance of comfort light weight and durability
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and lightweight. Lacing is simple and secure. Fit is slightly small but I find that with all Salomon
customer_reviews.author: Walker99

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and so far waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, walk the dog in them all the time. Go through mud, water, sea, sand and all sorts of terrain. Been brilliant and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues with the seller but the boots are a poor fit if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: If you have broad feet stay away from these boots im an 11 and they didnt fit, tried a 12 in a local shop and they were still tight across the foot. Opted for a different manufacturer and no worries. Returned the items no problem and refunded so a good experience just the p-roduct didnt suit me.
customer_reviews.author: gcarm76

customer_reviews.title: great set of boots
customer_reviews.text: great set of boots, ignore climbing, they are great walking boots too, lace ups are good as final 2 are just hooks
customer_reviews.author: M. goldin

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Like most i went for the next size up which fits well they are light well made with a good grip on the sole tested them out with a 5 mile walk to bed them in very pleased with the boots
customer_reviews.author: Darren Marshall

customer_reviews.title: ... larger than I normally take and they are a perfect fit. Really comfortable and totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I normally take and they are a perfect fit. Really comfortable and totally waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a 100km 5 day hike. I barely had a chance to wear them in but still got no blisters and they were very comfortable for the entire hike. I got a UK 10 size which is the size I normally get for shoes - they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Seem tight at first but surprisingly comfy,
customer_reviews.text: Seem tight at first but surprisingly comfy , haven't tried them in heavy rain yet but fingers crossed they are ok
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Only used them on short walks so far but I’m impressed by how comfortable they feel. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Really like the boots they are light weight and really comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the boots they are light weight and really comfortable so far so good I am normally a size 9 and had to go with a size 10 and they fit perfect make sure to go one size up with Salomon.
customer_reviews.author: Mickbo

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light. Easy to wear straight from the box. Neat fitting, possibly a half size bigger required if thick socks are worn. Easy to put on but laces can need re tightening at times. Have not yet tested waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: . James m

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, size a little small and good warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Salomon boots although they have a reputation for leaking but there is a 2 year warranty on them. Just don’t buy from Activinstinct as they are hopeless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long walk
customer_reviews.text: Walked in rain and wind for 22km up and around Kinder scout, with no blisters at end or wet feet. All good : )
customer_reviews.author: David martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. Ordered one full size up from normal which is proving to be right. Took very little waring in. Very comfortable. Dry.
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: Shoes sizes are very small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are excellent however worth noting sizes are very small. I'm a size 9, I ordered a 9.5 to be safe and they were tiny... Had to order a 10.5 to be sure they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Hitchmough

customer_reviews.title: Great walking boots
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these boots , really comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support for power walking
customer_reviews.text: This boot has an excellent narrow fit for my long, narrow feet. good durability and great comfort. Sensible price for a quality ergonomic fit and I'm on my 4th pair.
customer_reviews.author: TJGWalkright

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got a size up and they fit well, lovely light boots
customer_reviews.author: Cathyb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My wife is wearing them and they fit her perfect. We tried them on in the store first to make sure we got the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Mädler

customer_reviews.title: ... Ultra Mid GTX around the world and the fit like a glove and felt like I wasn’t wearing anything
customer_reviews.text: Have worn the original Ultra Mid GTX around the world and the fit like a glove and felt like I wasn’t wearing anything, they’re so comfortable. And here new ones are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jason J Colless

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really can't fault them as I love the fit, look, price and quality. Will save me £400 in trainer's using these for daily life without a car!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 pairs 1 pair werent right size but couldnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 pairs 1 pair werent right size but couldnt fault service for refunds...Boots out of this world so light to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit. No breaking in required. Good support. Time will tell how robust they are in wet and rough conditions but no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt King

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable walking boots and very lightweight but still supportive
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable walking boots and very lightweight but still supportive.
customer_reviews.author: richard56

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Fits just as well as the X Ultra Mid 2
customer_reviews.text: Don't notice any real difference to the X Ultra Mid 2, but still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: A lovely boot but a full size to small
customer_reviews.text: I saw this pair of boots in a closing sale in a sportswear shop. They were advertised as a size 10 and I am a normal, wide foot 9 always have been, I at first dismissed them but when, in the absence of there being any other quality boots, I tried them on I found that they they were a perfect fit, which was presumably why they were the only pair of Salomon boots left for sale, people saw the size 10 and thought that they would be too big. They have been heavily used for months and are so comfortable. Highly recommended but do buy with care as the sizing is way off.
customer_reviews.author: MR STEPHEN KEMBER

customer_reviews.title: Blisters!!
customer_reviews.text: My much loved Salomon prime gtx boots having done 1200 miles or so have lost their tread...otherwise intact. Great boots!! I purchased the new product and found them shoddy, cheap looking and within 6km's, moderate pennine yomp I had blisters on both heels. I never had any blister issues with my previous boots. My prime boots were made in Vietnam, these are made in India. There is a significant difference in boot quality. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: but doesn't feel like it will cope with sharp
customer_reviews.text: Construction is ok, but doesn't feel like it will cope with sharp, rocky terrain. The shoe dug into the top of my toes, where the fold is, when I walked. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Look the part but poorly made..
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots for about 8 months and the soles are falling apart and also they started to leak water after about 4/5 months.. this is after a bought the trainers version that fell apart after about 10 months... I am never going to buy Salomon again.. poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Sean A

customer_reviews.title: So light and comfy
customer_reviews.text: After years of hillwalking and scrambling in heavy leather boots I recently bought a pair of these, Oh my Goodness, what a difference, I feel as if I'm wearing carpet slippers. They are so light and comfortable. I've just come back from a trip to Snowdonia walking and scrambling in these boots and they were very good. The ground was very wet in places and the boots were submerged many times in water but never leaked. If I was doing long days over rocky terrain I might still wear my old leather boots as the soles are slightly stiffer but for most walking and scrambling I will now be wearing the Salomons
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of different ones before and they never performed really well. Those shoes instead are amazing. Keep your feet dry and they have a very strong grip. I will buy another pair. Only complain is I don't think a full black version exist.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Is prime worth it ?
customer_reviews.text: Great boots as are most Salomen. Not sure why Im paying for Prime as they took over a week to be delivered !?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these and they are not great, meant to be gore-tex but they leaked and my feet got wet the first time they got wet, i take a size 9 but had to grt a 10 as they were yoo tight, the tongue of the boot rubs on your ankle bone so i had to keep pulling it out, i have 3 other pairs of hiking boots and these are the eorst ive ever bought, wont be buying salomon again.
customer_reviews.author: fireball

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's X Ultra 3 Mid GTX Climbing Shoes
product_meta.description: The Salomon Men's X Ultra Mid 3 GTX Hiking Boot provides stability and comfort for fast and light hiking adventures. Uppers are GORE-TEX® membrane,water-resistant fabric with structural synthetic overlays. Mid-cut profile for additional ankle support and protection. Midsoles are injected EVA with under-arch shanks to combine cushioning and support. Non-marking ContaGrip rubber helps the sole stick to any surface that the outdoor hosts. Low-profile lugs provide traction over a variety of directions and surfaces. Sensifit system works to cradle the foot providing a precise and secure fit.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF HIKING BOOTS - Whether you're hitting the trails or looking for a solid work shoe, these extra durable, waterproof, mid-height hiking boots are designed for maximum traction on any terrain.
A better road: Designed with lowering control technology, the X Ultra 3 GORE-TEX hiking shoe efficiently combats technical hikes and shines even on tough descents, even in wet conditions.

ABENTURE AWAITS: Whether you love a local day hike or go on the trails for a multi-day adventure, Salomon makes innovative hiking and backpack shoes and boots for men and women to help you reach the distance.
Time to play: whether trail running, hiking, backpacking or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes and equipment for children, men and women to help you take a new distance, personal record or event.

Since 1947, Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports and innovation to create progressive equipment. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking shoes, boots and water shoes help to make every way your own.
